name: Arrow pit
description:
So, on this little prototype here we have 3 players with diferent skills sets, the tall one has a spears and cant be hurt by physical damange (touching the blorbs)

directional keys move him and he can dash by pressing O and attack by pressing P

The tiny one has a barrier that blocks bullets and can shoot

he moves with w a s d, shoots with c and creates a wall with e

the one with two shields blocks bullets and attacks with his shield

moves with t f g h and attacks with v

For debuging purposes they can use other functions with other keys, in the future you will be able to choose your class and choose your keys.

Thanks for playing and have fun!
